translated: the majority of the great beings have disappeared;

original: de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur pa yi //
analyzed: de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur pa yi //
translated: those who have not seen the truth, acting as they please,

original: ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so //
analyzed: ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so //
translated: have disturbed this teaching with their bad ideas.

original: rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams //
analyzed: rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams //
translated: Those who have cherished the teaching of the Self-Existent One,

original: mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na //
analyzed: mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na //
translated: now that the Protector of the world has gone to the supreme repose,

original: 'doms med yon tan 'joms par byed pa yi //
analyzed: 'doms med yon tan 'joms par byed pa yi //
translated: are without a guide; the defilements, which destroy good qualities,

original: dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod //
analyzed: dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod //
translated: are now, at their pleasure, acting in this world.

original: de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni //
translated: Thus the teaching of the Muni

original: lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams //
analyzed: lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams //
translated: is like a man whose life has gone out, like a body without breath.

original: stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni //
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni //
translated: Knowing that the time of defilement is powerful,

original: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis bag yod gyis  //
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis bag yod gyis  //
translated: those who desire liberation should be vigilant.

original: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The AbhidharmakoÅ›a composed by the master Vasubandhu is completed.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang // zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang // zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
